# vue-mask
Input masking directive for Vue.js

The directive can be attached to inputs and used like so `v-mask="99/99/9999"`.

## Installation

### NPM

```bash
$ npm install vue-mask
```

### CommonJS

```js
var Mask = require('vue-mask')

new Vue({
  el: 'body',
  directives: {
    'v-mask': Mask
  }
})
```
